Words.English: traditional western music
Words.Chinese: 西方传统音乐

Words.English: the capital of Austria
Words.Chinese: 奥地利首都

Words.English: go through
Words.Chinese: 流经

Words.English: listen to the fantastic voice
Words.Chinese: 听着绝妙的嗓音

Words.English: a fan of rock music
Words.Chinese: 摇滚乐迷

Words.English: give us a break
Words.Chinese: 饶了我们吧(得了吧,让我们清静会吧)

Words.English: much too fast/heavy
Words.Chinese: 太快/沉

Words.English: too much work/water
Words.Chinese: 太多工作/水

Words.English: know little/much about
Words.Chinese: 不太了解/非常了解

Words.English: the center of European classical music
Words.Chinese: 欧洲古典音乐的中心

Words.English: take sb. around
Words.Chinese: 带…周游

Words.English: give concerts
Words.Chinese: 开音乐会

Words.English: hundreds of wonderful pieces of music
Words.Chinese: 几百部动听的音乐作品

Words.English: at an early age
Words.Chinese: 在…早年间

Words.English: come out
Words.Chinese: 发表,出版

Words.English: lose one's hearing
Words.Chinese: 丧失听力

Words.English: in the last ten years of Beethoven's life
Words.Chinese: 在贝多芬生命的最后十年里

Words.English: take place
Words.Chinese: 发生

Words.English: The Blue Danube is Western music, isn't it Yes, it is.
Words.Chinese: 《蓝色多瑙河》是西方音乐,是吧?是的

Words.English: Is this piece of music by Strauss or Mozart? It's by Strauss.
Words.Chinese: 这首曲子时施特劳斯的作品还是莫扎特的作品。是施特劳斯的作品

Words.English: What a beautiful city (it is) How beautiful the city is!
Words.Chinese: 一座很美丽的城市

Words.English: Do you like rock music or pop music? I like both.
Words.Chinese: 你喜欢摇滚乐还是流行音乐?我都喜欢。

Words.English: You listen to modern music, don’t you? No, I don’t.
Words.Chinese: 你听现代音乐,对吧?不,我不听。

Words.English: What noisy drums they are playing!
Words.Chinese: 他们正在击打的鼓声很大

Words.English: What music do you like? I like pop, because it's lively and good to dance to.
Words.Chinese: 你喜欢什么音乐?我喜欢流行音乐,因为它很轻快,很适合跳舞。

Words.English: The father, J S the elder, wrote and played music for traditional dances, called the waltz.
Words.Chinese: 父亲老约翰·施特劳斯创作并演奏一种古典舞曲,叫华尔兹。

Words.English: His dance music made him famous all over Europe.
Words.Chinese: 他的舞曲让他闻名欧洲

Words.English: M was another very important composer.
Words.Chinese: 莫扎特是另一位非常重要的作曲家。

Words.English: Before he was six, he played not only the piano but also the violin.
Words.Chinese: 他不到六岁,就不仅会弹钢琴,还会拉小提琴。

Words.English: He became very poor and died in 1791 when he was only 35.
Words.Chinese: 他变得很穷困,于1791年去世,年仅35岁。

Words.English: I don’t believe the sound is very different.
Words.Chinese: 我简直无法相信这个声音太不一样了。

Words.English: In the eighteenth century, a lot of musicians came to study and work in Vienna.
Words.Chinese: 在十八世纪,许多音乐家到维也纳学习和工作。

Words.English: Like J S, father and son, he was a great European musician, and many people still think his music is perfect.
Words.Chinese: 像施特劳斯父子一样,他是一位伟大的欧洲音乐家,现在许多人仍然认为他的音乐是完美的。

Words.English: Vienna is a beautiful old city on the River Danube in the center of Europe.
Words.Chinese: 维也纳是位于欧洲中部多瑙河畔的一座古老而美丽的城市。

Words.English: In the S family, there were two composers called Johann S, the father and the son.
Words.Chinese: 在施特劳斯家族,有两位名为约翰·施特劳斯的作家:父亲和儿子。
